messages.messageBody:
please klick...........


http://tinyurl.com/24r96


What's the best way to " repair " the tsuka whale baleen wrap ?
As you all can see from the pic, some of that is broken und sticking
out like a bad hair day.
Cutting the stick out ones, then glue the cut end down ?
tuck the sticking out end under the still good wrap then apply glue ?

Happy New year und thank you all in advance............

milt
